chat_history.message:
Dear Backcare,

I understand that there is no SAV opened at this time. However, can I check the IMEI of the phone received by the customer? This can be found by keying in *#06# on their phone keypad. Thank you.

Regards,
RK

Hello  ecomobile,

We will ask the client and get back to you as soon as we have an answer

Thank you in advance for your attention,
Cindy Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Please update us when you receive a reply. Your assistance is greatly appreciated. Thanks!

Regards,
SY

Hi ecomobile,

I will do as per your request.

See you soon,
Avotriniaina, from Back Market customer service

Dear Backcare,

Thank you! We look forward hearing from you.

Regards,
SY

Dear Backcare,

Are there any updates to this?

Regards,
RK

Hi ecomobile,

Today, I've contacted the customer and we're still waiting for their answer.

Cordially,
Avotriniaina, from Back Market customer service
